s1_title: Wi-Fi Enabled Smart LED Light Bulb
s2_text: With Apple HomeKit technology, you can control connected light bulbs and scenes with Siri voice commands directly.
s3_text: Replace your existing E26/E27 light bulb. With the Koogeek Home app, you can easily control and monitor any connected light bulbs or scenes on your iOS device over a 2.4GHz Wi-Fi network.
s4_text: Up to 16 million colours are available in the Koogeek Home app.
s5_text: You can match the light colour to your mood and personalize your home.
s6_text: Create personalized scenes to control multiple connected light bulbs simultaneously with a single Siri voice command or just a tap.
